verses.verse: בְּיָמָ֣יו <WH3117> In his days עָלָ֔ה <WH5927> came up נְבֻכַדְנֶאצַּ֖ר <WH5019> Nebuchadnezzar מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֑ל <WH894> of Babylon וַיְהִי־ <WH1961> became ל֨וֹ יְהוֹיָקִ֥ים <WH3079> and Jehoiakim עֶ֙בֶד֙ <WH5650> became his servant שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> three שָׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> years וַיָּ֖שָׁב <WH7725> then he turned וַיִּמְרָד־ <WH4775> and rebelled בּֽוֹ׃

וַיְשַׁלַּ֣ח <WH7971> sent יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <WH3068> And the LORD בּ֡וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> גְּדוּדֵ֣י <WH1416> against him bands כַשְׂדִּים֩ <WH3778> of the Chaldees וְאֶת־ <WH853> גְּדוּדֵ֨י <WH1416> and bands אֲרָ֜ם <WH758> of the Syrians וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> גְּדוּדֵ֣י <WH1416> and bands מוֹאָ֗ב <WH4124> of the Moabites וְאֵת֙ <WH853> גְּדוּדֵ֣י <WH1416> and bands בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children עַמּ֔וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וַיְשַׁלְּחֵ֥ם <WH7971> and sent בִּֽיהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> them against Judah לְהַֽאֲבִיד֑וֹ <WH6> to destroy כִּדְבַ֣ר <WH1697> it according to the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֔ר <WH1696> which he spake בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> by עֲבָדָ֥יו <WH5650> his servants הַנְּבִיאִֽים׃ <WH5030> the prophets

אַ֣ךְ ׀ <WH389> Surely עַל־ <WH5921> at פִּ֣י <WH6310> Surely at the commandment יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD הָֽיְתָה֙ <WH1961> came בִּֽיהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> came [this] upon Judah לְהָסִ֖יר <WH5493> to remove מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from פָּנָ֑יו <WH6440> [them] out of his sight בְּחַטֹּ֣את <WH2403> for the sins מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> of Manasseh כְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he עָשָֽׂה׃ <WH6213> according to all that he did

וְגַ֤ם <WH1571> and also דַּֽם־ <WH1818> blood הַנָּקִי֙ <WH5355> And also for the innocent אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which שָׁפָ֔ךְ <WH8210> that he shed וַיְמַלֵּ֥א <WH4390> for he filled אֶת־ <WH853> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> Jerusalem דָּ֣ם <WH1818> blood נָקִ֑י <WH5355> with innocent וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אָבָ֥ה <WH14> would יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> which the LORD לִסְלֹֽחַ׃ <WH5545> not pardon

וְיֶ֛תֶר <WH3499> Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> of the acts יְהוֹיָקִ֖ים <WH3079> of Jehoiakim וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> and all that he did הֲלֹא־ <WH3808> not הֵ֣ם <WH1992> like כְּתוּבִ֗ים <WH3789> [are] they not written עַל־ <WH5921> in סֵ֛פֶר <WH5612> in the book דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> of the acts הַיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> age לְמַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> of the kings יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> Judah

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֥ב <WH7901> slept יְהוֹיָקִ֖ים <WH3079> So Jehoiakim עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָ֑יו <WH1> with his fathers וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <WH4427> reigned יְהוֹיָכִ֥ין <WH3078> and Jehoiachin בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <WH8478> his place

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not הֹסִ֥יף <WH3254> not again עוֹד֙ <WH5750> again מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לָצֵ֖את <WH3318> came מֵֽאַרְצ֑וֹ <WH776> any more out of his land כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לָקַ֞ח <WH3947> had taken מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> for the king בָּבֶ֗ל <WH894> of Babylon מִנַּ֤חַל <WH5158> from the river מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> of Egypt עַד־ <WH5704> against נְהַר־ <WH5104> unto the river פְּרָ֔ת <WH6578> Euphrates כֹּ֛ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that הָיְתָ֖ה <WH1961> belonged לְמֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> all that pertained to the king מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt פ

בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שְׁמֹנֶ֨ה <WH8083> eight עֶשְׂרֵ֤ה <WH6240> teen שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years יְהוֹיָכִ֣ין <WH3078> Jehoiachin בְּמָלְכ֔וֹ <WH4427> when he began to reign וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> three חֳדָשִׁ֔ים <WH2320> months מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> And his mother's נְחֻשְׁתָּ֥א <WH5179> [was] Nehushta בַת־ <WH1323> the daughter אֶלְנָתָ֖ן <WH494> of Elnathan מִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> of Jerusalem

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> And he did הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> had done אָבִֽיו׃ <WH1> according to all that his father

בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> At that time הַהִ֔יא <WH1931> he [עָלָה כ] (עָל֗וּ <WH5927> arise ק) עַבְדֵ֛י <WH5650> the servants נְבֻכַדְנֶאצַּ֥ר <WH5019> of Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> of Babylon יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> against Jerusalem וַתָּבֹ֥א <WH935> came הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> and the city בַּמָּצֽוֹר׃ <WH4692> siege

וַיָּבֹ֛א <WH935> came נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּ֥ר <WH5019> And Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> of Babylon עַל־ <WH5921> unto הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> against the city וַעֲבָדָ֖יו <WH5650> and his servants צָרִ֥ים <WH6696> did besiege עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> and

וַיֵּצֵ֞א <WH3318> went out יְהוֹיָכִ֤ין <WH3078> And Jehoiachin מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah עַל־ <WH5921> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> of Babylon ה֣וּא <WH1931> he וְאִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> he and his mother וַעֲבָדָ֖יו <WH5650> and his servants וְשָׂרָ֣יו <WH8269> and his princes וְסָֽרִיסָ֑יו <WH5631> and his officers וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> took אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> of Babylon בִּשְׁנַ֥ת <WH8141> year שְׁמֹנֶ֖ה <WH8083> him in the eighth לְמָלְכֽוֹ׃ <WH4427> of his reign

וַיּוֹצֵ֣א <WH3318> And he carried out מִשָּׁ֗ם <WH8033> there אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אוֹצְרוֹת֙ <WH214> thence all the treasures בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְאֽוֹצְר֖וֹת <WH214> and the treasures בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king's וַיְקַצֵּ֞ץ <WH7112> and cut in pieces אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all כְּלֵ֣י <WH3627> all the vessels הַזָּהָ֗ב <WH2091> of gold אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֜ה <WH6213> had made שְׁלֹמֹ֤ה <WH8010> which Solomon מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel בְּהֵיכַ֣ל <WH1964> in the temple יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> had said יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> as the LORD

וְהִגְלָ֣ה <WH1540> And he carried away אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְ֠רוּשָׁלִַם <WH3389> all Jerusalem וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַשָּׂרִ֞ים <WH8269> and all the princes וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all גִּבּוֹרֵ֣י <WH1368> and all the mighty men הַחַ֗יִל <WH2428> of valour [עֲשָׂרָה כ] (עֲשֶׂ֤רֶת <WH6235> ten ק) אֲלָפִים֙ <WH505> thousand גּוֹלֶ֔ה <WH1473> captive וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הֶחָרָ֖שׁ <WH2796> and all the craftsmen וְהַמַּסְגֵּ֑ר <WH4525> and smiths לֹ֣א <WH3808> None נִשְׁאַ֔ר <WH7604> none remained זוּלַ֖ת <WH2108> save דַּלַּ֥ת <WH1803> the poorest sort עַם־ <WH5971> of the people הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the land

וַיֶּ֥גֶל <WH1540> And he carried away אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוֹיָכִ֖ין <WH3078> Jehoiachin בָּבֶ֑לָה <WH894> to Babylon וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֵ֣ם <WH517> mother הַ֠מֶּלֶךְ <WH4428> and the king's וְאֶת־ <WH853> נְשֵׁ֨י <WH802> wives הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king's וְאֶת־ <WH853> סָרִיסָ֗יו <WH5631> and his officers וְאֵת֙ <WH853> [אֱוִלֵי כ] (אֵילֵ֣י <WH193> mighty ק) הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land הוֹלִ֛יךְ <WH1980> led גּוֹלָ֥ה <WH1473> he into captivity מִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> from Jerusalem בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <WH894> to Babylon

וְאֵת֩ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> All אַנְשֵׁ֨י <WH582> And all the men הַחַ֜יִל <WH2428> of might שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> [even] seven אֲלָפִ֗ים <WH505> thousand וְהֶחָרָ֤שׁ <WH2796> and craftsmen וְהַמַּסְגֵּר֙ <WH4525> and smiths אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> a thousand הַכֹּ֕ל <WH3605> all גִּבּוֹרִ֖ים <WH1368> all [that were] strong עֹשֵׂ֣י <WH6213> [and] apt מִלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> for war וַיְבִיאֵ֧ם <WH935> brought מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> even them the king בָּבֶ֛ל <WH894> of Babylon גּוֹלָ֖ה <WH1473> captive בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <WH894> to Babylon

וַיַּמְלֵ֧ךְ <WH4427> king מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> And the king בָּבֶ֛ל <WH894> of Babylon אֶת־ <WH853> מַתַּנְיָ֥ה <WH4983> made Mattaniah דֹד֖וֹ <WH1730> his father's brother תַּחְתָּ֑יו <WH8478> his place וַיַּסֵּ֥ב <WH5437> in his stead and changed אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name צִדְקִיָּֽהוּ׃ <WH6667> to Zedekiah פ

בֶּן־ <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <WH6242> [was] twenty וְאַחַ֤ת <WH259> and one שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years צִדְקִיָּ֣הוּ <WH6667> Zedekiah בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <WH4427> when he began to reign וְאַחַ֤ת <WH259> a עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <WH6240> ten שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> And his mother's [חֲמִיטַל כ] (חֲמוּטַ֥ל <WH2537> Hamutal ק) בַּֽת־ <WH1323> the daughter יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> of Jeremiah מִלִּבְנָֽה׃ <WH3841> of Libnah

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> And he did הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> had done יְהוֹיָקִֽים׃ <WH3079> according to all that Jehoiakim

כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> For עַל־ <WH5921> through אַ֣ף <WH639> For through the anger יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD הָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> came בִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> it came to pass in Jerusalem וּבִ֣יהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> and Judah עַד־ <WH5704> until הִשְׁלִכ֥וֹ <WH7993> until he had cast them out אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> through פָּנָ֑יו <WH6440> from his presence וַיִּמְרֹ֥ד <WH4775> rebelled צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH6667> that Zedekiah בְּמֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> against the king בָּבֶֽל׃ <WH894> of Babylon ס
